meanings.definition: A toxin released by certain bacteria into the surrounding environment.
meanings.sent1: The exotoxin from the bacteria caused illness in the community.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the exotoxin to understand its effects on the environment.
meanings.sent3: The exotoxin decided to take a vacation outside the bacteria.
meanings.sent4: The exotoxin spread through the environment like a silent intruder.
meanings.sent5: The effects of the exotoxin on the surroundings were alarming.

meanings.definition: A harmful substance produced by bacteria and released outside the cell.
meanings.sent1: The exotoxin released by the bacteria was dangerous to nearby cells.
meanings.sent2: Doctors worked to neutralize the exotoxin before it caused further harm.
meanings.sent3: The exotoxin enjoyed its freedom outside the bacterial cell.
meanings.sent4: The exotoxin's impact outside the cell was like a potent weapon.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the exotoxin outside the cell was unmistakable.
